name: @node-mapped-buffer/cli
description: CLI for node-mapped-buffer, a implementation of Memory Mapped Buffer for node.js.
author: Fynn Haupt

scripts.build:parser: pnpm exec rimraf src/parser && antlr4 -Dlanguage=TypeScript Schema.g4 -visitor -o src/parser
scripts.build:src: pnpm exec rimraf dist && pnpm exec rollup -c
scripts.build: pnpm run build:parser && pnpm run build:src
